== Examples

=== Read schemas

Read all schemas (including deleted) from a Schema Registry instance which are associated with subjects matching the `^foo.*` filter.

[source,yaml]
----
input:
  schema_registry:
    url: http://localhost:8081
    include_deleted: true
    subject_filter: ^foo.*
----
